simplefavoritelistfor: (for user) string displayed under the special page title
nosimplefavoritelist: Displayed on the special page and embedded favorites lists when the favorites list is empty
simplefavoritelistanontext: Displayed on the special page and embedded favorites lists to anonymous users
simplefavoritenologin: Title of the special page displayed to anonymous users
addedsimplefavoritetext: Tooltip displayed when a page is added to a user's favorites via the star
removedsimplefavoritetext: Tooltip displayed when a page is removed from a user's favorites via the star
simplefavorite: Text displayed in the page menu to favorite a page
unsimplefavorite: Text displayed in the page menu to remove a page from a user's favorites
simplefavoriteerrortext: Displayed when an error occurs while toggling a favorite
unsimplefavoriteing: Displayed in the page menu while removing a page from the user's favorites
simplefavoriteing: Displayed in the page menu while adding a page from the user's favorites
tooltip-ca-simplefavorite: Tooltip displayed on the Favorite link and the star on a page not in the user's favorites
tooltip-ca-unsimplefavorite: Tooltip displayed on the Unfavorite link and the star on a page in the user's favorites
simplefavoritelistedit-numitems: Displayed on the favorites edit page when there is at least one page in the user's favorites
simplefavoritelistedit-noitems: Displayed on the favorites edit page when there are no pages in the user's favorites
simplefavoritelistedit-normal-title: Title displayed on the edit favorites page
simplefavoritelistedit-normal-legend: Form title displayed on the edit favorites page
simplefavoritelistedit-normal-explain: Text in the remove favorites form
simplefavoritelistedit-normal-submit: Text displayed on the edit favorites submit button
simplefavoritelistedit-raw-title: Title displayed on the edit raw favorites list page
simplefavoritelistedit-raw-legend: Form title displayed on the edit raw favorites list page
simplefavoritelistedit-raw-explain: Text in the edit raw favorites form
simplefavoritelistedit-raw-titles: Text displayed immediately before the raw favorites list
simplefavoritelistedit-raw-submit: Text displayed on the edit raw favorites submit button
simplefavoritelistedit-raw-done: Text displayed after editing the raw favorites list
simplefavoritelistedit-raw-added: Text displayed after editing the raw favorites list indicating what favorites were added
simplefavoritelistedit-raw-removed: Text displayed after editing the raw favorites list indicating what favorites were removed
simplefavoritelisttools-view: View favorites page listing on favorites special pages
simplefavoritelisttools-edit: View and edit favorites page listing on favorites special pages
simplefavoritelisttools-raw: Edit raw favorites list page listing on favorites special pages
